==German== ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|de|schalten|er}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʃaltɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Schalter.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m||Schalter}} # {{agent noun of|de|schalten}} ## [[switch]] {{gloss|device to turn electric current on and off or direct its flow}} ## [[information window]], [[ticket window]], [[box office]] {{gloss|staffed cabin}} ## {{lb|de|by extension}} a [[counter]] in a [[train station]], [[bank]], state [[office]], or similar place where a cabin as above would normally be found (even if it happens not to be one) ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|s}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
